body.name: Hamilton Counter Stool

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 15 hrs 46 mins
features: Seat upholstered in a diamond pattern taupe/beige fabric-100-percent polyester
Materials: metal, particleboard, oak, fabric - 100% polyester, polyurethane foam pad
body.description: The Hamilton Counter Stool features a diamond shaped back and slight curved legs. The top of the back piece is a sleek "Brushed Faux Medium Cherry" wood, while the frame is a "Matte Pewter and Bronze" metal. This piece is sure to add interest and extra seating to your table. Some assembly required.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powell Furniture Powell designs, imports, and distributes on trend occasional, dining, bedroom, youth and accent furniture across all style categories for retailers around the world. With over 40 years of experience in international sourcing. We are focused on quality control and most importantly craftsmanship.

Extraordinary Displays of Home Fashion Excellence & Experience Powell focuses on quality control, craftsmanship, unique finishes and timely delivery. You can buy our products with confidence, knowing that you are investing in decades of manufacturing excellence and experience. Powell will continue to pursue their excellency within the furniture market and push for the best of the best within market. Award Winning Design & Quality Powell has won 3 Pinnacle Awards, the furniture industries most prestigious award for design, function and style. We offer outstanding values for every room indoors and out. We maintain a total commitment of quality, service and value that is unsurpassed in our industry. Making Powell Furniture the best in its class! International Capabilities Established in 1968, the company has grown to become the most recognized in the furniture industry for home accent furniture. With distribution centers in California and North Carolina, and offices in the United States, China, Vietnam, and Brazil we stand by our operations to ensure that sourcing, service, quality inspect and ship top quality furniture.

Chic & Style Powell translates a modern yet chic look into any home fashion/decor. Supremely chic and easy-care collection of furniture to make striking fashion statements in any home setting or space of your choice. We carefully select our materials and fabrics to ensure that it will compliment all styles within your home. Soft & Substantial Crafted with care, our furniture is made to last, making them a perfect addition to your favorite space or home. We take pride knowing that our products come from substantial sources that can make the appearance of your home change within seconds! Choose from a number of styles that best fit todays market. Functional & Fashionable Powell has established a reputation within the market of furniture by providing the best trend-right products, while offering excellent quality, style, and functional furnishing the market has to offer. We offer outstanding and ample commitment of quality, service and value that is unsurpassed in our industry.

Craftsmanship at its Finest! Powell products have earned a number of important awards for design, function, & style. Youth Furniture & Home Furniture category for example, Powell has been nominated for the furniture industries important Pinnacle Award 7 times! We have total commitment to quality and service that is unsurpassed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, comfortable, and well made
reviews.reviewText: These stools were so easy to assemble. There is some adjusting to get things to line up, but nothing to remove stars over! Great for larger size people that need extra room to sit and not feel like they are going to fall off of the chair. The appearance of them is way more expensive then what the price really is. If you are contemplating getting these chairs, don't delay, you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stools, great price
reviews.reviewText: Love these stools! Easy to put together. Very solid and sturdy. We’ll worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these Stools
reviews.reviewText: Lovely, sturdy, comfortable. And so reasonably priced! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The chair is beautiful very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two chairs received one the other one got lost had to re-order still waiting for my order to come in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Look better than the chairs that came with our pub table and pretty easy to assemble.Cons: After only a few months, the fabric on the cushions is starting to rip. Pieces do not all line up well for assembly. Legs are uneven and on 2 of the 4 I purchased we needed to put pads on the bottom to try to level them out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Could use felt on bottom of legs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stool looks very nice but after only a few months of occasional use ...
reviews.reviewText: Stool looks very nice but after only a few months of occasional use the fabric on the seats has ripped and needs to be reupholstered. Very disappointing since I am unable to return the item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my new kitchen! But...
reviews.reviewText: I ordered one to see the quality and how it looked in my new kitchen. It took about 15 mins. to put together and is very sturdy. The cushion is much larger and thicker than I thought, but very comfortable. The bronze is almost a dark grey/bronze and looks great. I'll be ordering two more.So...I ordered two more. They were obviously made by a different factory. The second one had very rough welds (a piece of wire sticking out too), did not align and was missing one of the plastic pads on the bottom of one of the feet. Additionally, the fabric of #2 and #3 is slightly lighter in color and the cushion a little less square and thick than #1. #3 went together fine and I will be keeping that and returning #2 for a replacement. It's too bad there is no quality control (and Amazon should get after companies that they stock and ship to do a better job), but as my husband said, just keep ordering them until you get a set you like. It took a little glimmer out of my love for these stools so I changed my rating to a 3 *.
